Unless otherwise specified, this article applies to both WebGL 1 and 2 contexts.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有规定,本文适用于WebGL 1和2上下文。

trans-unit.source: Unless stated otherwise, nodes based upon AudioScheduledSourceNode output silence when not playing (that is, before start() is called and after stop() is called). Silence is represented, as always, by a stream of samples with the value zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明，否则基于 AudioScheduledSourceNode 的节点在不播放时（即，在调用 start() 之前和调用 stop() 之后）会输出静音。沉默始终如一地由零值（0）的样本流表示。

trans-unit.source: Unless the shapes you'll be drawing fill the complete canvas (for instance a backdrop image), you need to clear any shapes that have been drawn previously. The easiest way to do this is using the clearRect() method.
trans-unit.target: 除非您要绘制的形状充满整个画布（例如背景图像），否则您需要清除以前绘制的所有形状。最简单的方法是使用 clearRect() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Unless you only use exact constraints (which is pretty restrictive, so be sure you mean it!), there's no guarantee exactly what you're going to actually get after the constraints are applied. The values of the constrainable properties as they actually are in the resulting media are referred to as the settings. If you need to know the true format and other properties of the media, you can obtain those settings by calling MediaStreamTrack.getSettings(). This returns an object based on the dictionary MediaTrackSettings. For example:
trans-unit.target: 除非您仅使用严格的约束（这是非常严格的约束，所以请确保您是真的！），否则不能保证应用约束后您将实际获得的确切结果。实际在结果媒体中存在的可约束属性的值称为设置。如果需要了解媒体的真实格式和其他属性，则可以通过调用 MediaStreamTrack.getSettings() 获得这些设置。这将基于字典 MediaTrackSettings 返回一个对象。例如：

trans-unit.source: Unless your code is privileged (chrome or at least has the UniversalBrowserRead privilege), it may get the value of the general.oscpu.override preference instead of the true platform.
trans-unit.target: 除非您的代码具有特权（chrome或至少具有UniversalBrowserRead特权），否则它可能会获得 general.oscpu.override 首选项的值，而不是真正的平台。

trans-unit.source: Unlike "native" events, which are fired by the DOM and invoke event handlers asynchronously via the event loop, dispatchEvent invokes event handlers synchronously. All applicable event handlers will execute and return before the code continues on after the call to dispatchEvent.
trans-unit.target: 与DOM触发并通过事件循环异步调用事件处理程序的“本地”事件不同， dispatchEvent 同步调用事件处理程序。在调用 dispatchEvent 之后，所有适用的事件处理程序将在代码继续执行之前执行并返回。

trans-unit.source: Unlike document.adoptNode(), the original node is not removed from its original document. The imported node is a clone of the original.
trans-unit.target: 与 document.adoptNode() 不同，原始节点不会从其原始文档中删除。导入的节点是原始节点的克隆。

trans-unit.source: Unlike Range.extractContents, this method does not return a DocumentFragment containing the deleted content.
trans-unit.target: 与 Range.extractContents 不同，此方法不返回包含已删除内容的 DocumentFragment 。

trans-unit.source: Unlike SVG, <canvas> only supports one primitive shape: rectangles. All other shapes must be created by combining one or more paths, lists of points connected by lines. Luckily, we have an assortment of path drawing functions which make it possible to compose very complex shapes.
trans-unit.target: 与SVG不同， <canvas> 仅支持一种原始形状：矩形。所有其他形状必须通过组合一条或多条路径，由线连接的点的列表来创建。幸运的是，我们有各种各样的路径绘制功能，它们可以组成非常复杂的形状。

trans-unit.source: Unlike RTCPeerConnection.localDescription, this value represents the actual current state of the local end of the connection; localDescription may specify a description which the connection is currently in the process of switching over to.
trans-unit.target: 与 RTCPeerConnection.localDescription 不同，此值表示连接本地端的实际当前状态。 localDescription 可以指定连接当前正在切换到的描述。

trans-unit.source: Unlike RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription, this value represents the actual current state of the local end of the connection; remoteDescription may specify a description which the connection is currently in the process of switching over to.
trans-unit.target: 与 RTCPeerConnection.remoteDescription 不同，此值表示连接本地端的实际当前状态。 remoteDescription 可以指定连接当前正在切换到的描述。

trans-unit.source: Unlike WebSockets, server-sent events are unidirectional; that is, data messages are delivered in one direction, from the server to the client (such as a user's web browser). That makes them an excellent choice when there's no need to send data from the client to the server in message form. For example, EventSource is a useful approach for handling things like social media status updates, news feeds, or delivering data into a client-side storage mechanism like IndexedDB or web storage.
trans-unit.target: 与WebSockets不同，服务器发送的事件是单向的。也就是说，数据消息是从服务器到客户端（例如用户的Web浏览器）沿一个方向传递的。当不需要以消息形式将数据从客户端发送到服务器时，这使它们成为绝佳的选择。例如， EventSource 是用于处理诸如社交媒体状态更新，新闻提要或将数据传递到客户端存储机制（如IndexedDB或Web存储）之类的有用方法。

trans-unit.source: Unlike textContent, altering innerText in Internet Explorer (version 11 and below) removes child nodes from the element and permanently destroys all descendant text nodes. It is impossible to insert the nodes again into any other element or into the same element anymore.
trans-unit.target: 与 textContent 不同，在Internet Explorer（版本11及更低版本）中更改 innerText 会从元素中删除子节点，并永久破坏所有后代文本节点。不可能再将节点再次插入任何其他元素或同一元素中。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other nodes in the Web Audio API, the options passed into the IIR filter upon creation are not optional. The filter needs these values to work and with the vast range of filters available, there is no default.
trans-unit.target: 与Web Audio API中的其他节点不同,在创建IIR过滤器时传入的选项不是可选的。过滤器需要这些值才能工作,而且由于过滤器的种类繁多,没有默认值。

trans-unit.source: Unlike other timing data available to JavaScript (for example Date.now), the timestamps returned by Performance.now() are not limited to one-millisecond resolution. Instead, they represent times as floating-point numbers with up to microsecond precision.
trans-unit.target: 与JavaScript可用的其他计时数据（例如 Date.now ）不同， Performance.now() 返回的时间戳不限于毫秒级分辨率。相反，它们将时间表示为浮点数，精度高达微秒。

trans-unit.source: Unlike some other element-lookup methods such as Document.querySelector() and Document.querySelectorAll(), getElementById() is only available as a method of the global document object, and not available as a method on all element objects in the DOM. Because ID values must be unique throughout the entire document, there is no need for "local" versions of the function.
trans-unit.target: 与其他一些元素查找方法（例如 Document.querySelector() 和 Document.querySelectorAll() )不同， getElementById() 仅可用作全局 document 对象的方法，而不适用于DOM中所有元素对象的方法。因为ID值在整个文档中必须唯一，所以不需要该功能的“本地”版本。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the model matrix, which directly transforms the model vertices, the view matrix moves an abstract camera around. In reality the vertex shader is still only moving the models and the "camera" stays in place. In order for this to work out correctly the inverse of the transform matrix must be used. The inverse matrix essentially reverses a transformation. So if we move the camera view forward, it moves all of the objects in the scene back.
trans-unit.target: 与模型矩阵不同的是,模型矩阵直接变换模型顶点,而视图矩阵则是移动一个抽象的摄像头。实际上,顶点着色器仍然只是移动模型,而 "摄像机 "则停留在原地。为了使其正确地工作,必须使用变换矩阵的反转。反矩阵本质上是反转了一个变换。因此,如果我们将摄像机视图向前移动,它就会将场景中的所有物体向后移动。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the path functions we'll see in the next section, all three rectangle functions draw immediately to the canvas.
trans-unit.target: 与我们将在下一节看到的路径函数不同,这三个矩形函数都会立即绘制到画布上。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the similar methods in the Fetch API, which only allow the method to be invoked once, these methods can be called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 与Fetch API中的类似方法不同，后者仅允许一次调用该方法，而这些方法可以多次调用。

trans-unit.source: Unloading Documents — Prompt to unload a document
trans-unit.target: 卸载文档-提示卸载文档

trans-unit.source: Unlock the screen orientation (only works in fullscreen or for installed apps)
trans-unit.target: 解锁屏幕方向(仅在全屏或已安装的应用程序中有效)。

trans-unit.source: Unlocks all keys captured by the lock() method and returns synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 解锁由 lock() 方法捕获的所有键并同步返回。

trans-unit.source: Unlocks the orientation of the containing document from its default orientation.
trans-unit.target: 从默认方向解锁包含文档的方向。

trans-unit.source: Unpacking of pixel data from memory.
trans-unit.target: 从内存中解压像素数据。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters and deletes a specified subscription endpoint. In the updated API, a subscription is unregistered by calling the PushSubscription.unsubscribe() method.
trans-unit.target: 注销并删除指定的订阅端点。在更新的API中，通过调用 PushSubscription.unsubscribe() 方法取消注册订阅。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the service worker registration and returns a Promise. The service worker will finish any ongoing operations before it is unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 注销服务人员注册并返回 Promise 。服务工作者将在注销之前完成所有正在进行的操作。

trans-unit.source: Unselects any selected objects, including any selections of text strings and type-in bars.
trans-unit.target: 取消选择任何选定的对象,包括任何文本字符串和输入条的选择。

trans-unit.source: Unsigned integer type for 24-bit depth texture data.
trans-unit.target: 24位深度纹理数据的无符号整数类型。

trans-unit.source: Unsized sRGB format that leaves the precision up to the driver.
trans-unit.target: 不大的sRGB格式,将精度留给了驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Unsized sRGB format with unsized alpha component.
trans-unit.target: 无大小的sRGB格式,无大小的alpha组件。
自Gecko 13（Firefox 13）起不受支持。请改用 Window.localStorage 。

trans-unit.source: Unsuspends (i.e., unpauses) currently running animations that are defined within the SVG document fragment, causing the animation clock to continue from the time at which it was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 取消暂停(即解除暂停)当前正在运行的定义在SVG文档片段中的动画,使动画时钟从被暂停的时间开始继续。

trans-unit.source: Until Firefox 26 included, when the vibration pattern was too long or any of its elements too large, Firefox threw an exception instead of returning false (bug 884935).
trans-unit.target: 在包含Firefox 26之前，当振动模式过长或任何元素过大时，Firefox都会引发异常，而不是返回 false （错误884935）。

trans-unit.source: Until now we have created our own shapes and applied styles to them. One of the more exciting features of <canvas> is the ability to use images. These can be used to do dynamic photo compositing or as backdrops of graphs, for sprites in games, and so forth. External images can be used in any format supported by the browser, such as PNG, GIF, or JPEG. You can even use the image produced by other canvas elements on the same page as the source!
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们已经创建了自己的形状并对其应用了样式。 <canvas> 的更令人兴奋的功能之一是使用图像的能力。这些可用于进行动态照片合成或用作图形的背景，用于游戏中的精灵等。外部图像可以使用浏览器支持的任何格式，例如PNG，GIF或JPEG。您甚至可以在源页面上使用其他画布元素产生的图像！

trans-unit.source: Until now we have made use of the clearRect method when clearing prior frames. If you replace this method with a semi-transparent fillRect, you can easily create a trailing effect.
trans-unit.target: 到现在为止，我们在清除先前帧时都使用了 clearRect 方法。如果用半透明的 fillRect 替换此方法，则可以轻松创建拖尾效果。

trans-unit.source: Until now we haven't looked at the actual pixels of our canvas. With the ImageData object you can directly read and write a data array to manipulate pixel data. We will also look into how image smoothing (anti-aliasing) can be controlled and how to save images from your canvas.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们还没有研究过画布的实际像素。使用 ImageData 对象，您可以直接读写数据数组来操纵像素数据。我们还将研究如何控制图像平滑（抗锯齿）以及如何从画布中保存图像。

trans-unit.source: Up to this point we've built up our own 3D rendering setup, step by step. However the current rig has some issues. For one, it gets skewed whenever we resize our window. Another is that our simple projection doesn't handle a wide range of values for the scene data. Most scenes don't work in clip space. It would be helpful to define what distance is relevant to the scene so that precision isn't lost in converting the numbers. Finally it's very helpful to have a fine-tuned control over what points get placed inside and outside of clip space. In the previous examples the corners of the cube occasionally get clipped.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止,我们已经一步步建立了自己的3D渲染设置。然而目前的装备有一些问题。一是每当我们调整窗口的大小时,它就会发生倾斜。另一个是我们的简单投影并不能处理场景数据的大范围数值。大多数场景不能在剪辑空间中工作。定义什么距离与场景相关会很有帮助,这样在转换数字时就不会损失精度。最后,对夹子空间内和夹子空间外的哪些点进行微调控制是非常有帮助的。在前面的例子中,立方体的角落偶尔会被夹住。

trans-unit.source: Up until now we have only seen methods of the drawing context. If we want to apply colors to a shape, there are two important properties we can use: fillStyle and strokeStyle.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们只看到了绘图上下文的方法。如果要对形状应用颜色，则可以使用两个重要的属性： fillStyle 和 strokeStyle 。
更新了 WebGL 2 的定义。
更新了 WebGL 的定义。

trans-unit.source: Updates a sub-rectangle of the current WebGLTexture.
trans-unit.target: 更新当前 WebGLTexture 的子矩形。

trans-unit.source: Updates a subset of a buffer object's data store.
trans-unit.target: 更新缓冲区对象的数据存储子集。

trans-unit.source: Updates buffer data starting at a passed offset.
trans-unit.target: 从通过的偏移量开始更新缓冲区数据。

trans-unit.source: Updates the details of an existing PaymentRequest.
trans-unit.target: 更新现有 PaymentRequest 的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Updates the most recent entry on the history stack to have the specified data, title, and, if provided, URL. The data is treated as opaque by the DOM; you may specify any JavaScript object that can be serialized. Note that Firefox currently ignores the title parameter; for more information, see manipulating the browser history.
trans-unit.target: 更新历史记录堆栈上的最新条目，以具有指定的数据，标题和URL（如果提供）。数据被DOM视为不透明；您可以指定任何可以序列化的JavaScript对象。请注意，Firefox当前会忽略title参数。有关更多信息，请参见操纵浏览器历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Updates the specified timing properties of this AnimationEffect.
trans-unit.target: 更新此 AnimationEffect 的指定计时属性。

trans-unit.source: Updates the state of commands of the current chrome window (UI).
trans-unit.target: 更新当前chrome窗口(UI)的命令状态。

trans-unit.source: Updates the version of the database. Returns immediately and runs a versionchange transaction on the connected database in a separate thread.
trans-unit.target: 更新数据库的版本。立即返回并在单独的线程中对连接的数据库运行版本 versionchange 事务。
更新广告的可见性计时器

trans-unit.source: Updating an entry in the database
trans-unit.target: 更新数据库中的一个条目

trans-unit.source: Updating the displayed pitch and rate values
trans-unit.target: 更新显示的音调和速率值

trans-unit.source: Upon receiving a click event, we call getCurrentPosition() to request the device's current position. This is an asynchronous request, so we provide a callback which receives as in put a Position object describing the determined position.
trans-unit.target: 收到 click 事件后，我们调用 getCurrentPosition() 来请求设备的当前位置。这是一个异步请求，因此我们提供了一个回调函数，该回调函数按原样接收描述所确定位置的 Position 对象。

trans-unit.source: Upper bound of the key range.

Usage of compressed formats first requires activating the respective extension with WebGLRenderingContext.getExtension(). If supported, it will return an extension object with constants for the added formats and the formats will also be returned by calls to gl.getParameter(gl.COMPRESSED_TEXTURE_FORMATS). (E.g. ext.COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT1_EXT for the WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc extension.) These can then be used with compressedTexImage[23]D or compressedTexSubImage[23]D instead of texImage2D calls.
trans-unit.target: 使用压缩格式首先需要使用 WebGLRenderingContext.getExtension() 激活相应的扩展名。如果支持，它将返回带有添加格式常量的扩展对象，并且这些格式还将通过调用 gl.getParameter(gl.COMPRESSED_TEXTURE_FORMATS) 返回。（例如 ext.COMPRESSED_RGBA_S3TC_DXT1_EXT 为 WEBGL_compressed_texture_s3tc 扩展。）这些这时可以使用 compressedTexImage[23]D 或 compressedTexSubImage[23]D 代替 texImage2D 呼叫。

Use XMLHttpRequest (XHR) objects to interact with servers. You can retrieve data from a URL without having to do a full page refresh. This enables a Web page to update just part of a page without disrupting what the user is doing. XMLHttpRequest is used heavily in Ajax programming.

trans-unit.source: User agents are encouraged to obscure the exact size of the data used by a given origin, to prevent these values from being used for fingerprinting purposes.

trans-unit.source: User agents may use any method they choose to determine the size of origins' quotas, and are encouraged by the specification to provide popular or frequently-used sites with extra space.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理可以使用他们选择的任何方法来确定原点配额的大小,规范鼓励他们为受欢迎或经常使用的网站提供额外的空间。

trans-unit.source: User agents will typically ignore asynchronous XMLHttpRequests made in an unload handler. To solve this problem, analytics and diagnostics code will typically make a synchronous XMLHttpRequest in an unload or beforeunload handler to submit the data. The synchronous XMLHttpRequest forces the browser to delay unloading the document, and makes the next navigation appear to be slower. There is nothing the next page can do to avoid this perception of poor page load performance.
trans-unit.target: 用户代理通常将忽略在卸载处理程序中进行的异步 XMLHttpRequests 。为了解决此问题，分析和诊断代码通常会在 unload 或 beforeunload 处理程序中创建一个同步 XMLHttpRequest 来提交数据。同步的 XMLHttpRequest 强制浏览器延迟卸载文档，并使得下一次导航显得更慢。下一页无法采取任何措施来避免这种糟糕的页面加载性能的感觉。

trans-unit.source: Using highp precision in fragment shaders will prevent your content from working on some older mobile hardware. You can use mediump instead, but be aware that this often results in corrupted rendering due to lack of precision on most mobile devices, and the corruption is not going to be visible on a typical desktop computer. In general, only using highp in both vertex and fragment shaders is safer unless shaders are thoroughly tested on a variety of platforms. Starting in Firefox 11, the WebGL getShaderPrecisionFormat() function is implemented, allowing you to check if highp precision is supported, and more generally letting you query the actual precision of all supported precision qualifiers.
trans-unit.target: 使用 highp 在片段着色精度会阻止你的内容从一些旧手机硬件的工作。您可以改用 mediump ，但要注意，由于大多数移动设备上的精度不足，这通常会导致渲染损坏，并且在典型的台式计算机上这种损坏将不可见。通常，除非在各种平台上对着色器进行全面测试，否则仅在顶点着色器和片段着色器中都使用 highp 更为安全。从Firefox 11开始，将实现WebGL getShaderPrecisionFormat() 函数，使您可以检查是否支持 highp 精度，更普遍的是，您可以查询所有受支持的精度限定符的实际精度。

trans-unit.source: Using quadratic and cubic Bézier curves can be quite challenging, because unlike vector drawing software like Adobe Illustrator, we don't have direct visual feedback as to what we're doing. trans-unit.source: Using the <canvas> element is not very difficult, but you do need a basic understanding of HTML and JavaScript. The <canvas> element and WebGL are not supported in some older browsers, but are supported in recent versions of all major browsers. In order to draw graphics on the canvas we use a JavaScript context object, which creates graphics on the fly.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <canvas> 元素并不是很困难，但是您确实需要对HTML和JavaScript有基本的了解。该 <canvas> 的元素和WebGL没有在一些较旧的浏览器的支持，但在最近版本的所有主流浏览器都支持。为了在画布上绘制图形，我们使用一个JavaScript上下文对象，该对象可以动态创建图形。

trans-unit.source: Using the <canvas> element is not very difficult, but you do need a basic understanding of HTML and JavaScript. The <canvas> element is not supported in some older browsers, but is supported in recent versions of all major browsers. The default size of the canvas is 300 px × 150 px (width × height). But custom sizes can be defined using the HTML height and width property. In order to draw graphics on the canvas we use a JavaScript context object, which creates graphics on the fly.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <canvas> 元素并不是很困难，但是您确实需要对HTML和JavaScript有基本的了解。该 <canvas> 的元素不会在一些较旧的浏览器的支持，但在最近版本的所有主流浏览器的支持。画布的默认大小为300像素×150像素（宽度×高度）。但是可以使用HTML height 和 width 属性定义自定义大小。为了在画布上绘制图形，我们使用一个JavaScript上下文对象，该对象可以动态创建图形。

trans-unit.source: Using the crossorigin attribute of an <img> element (reflected by the HTMLImageElement.crossOrigin property), you can request permission to load an image from another domain for use in your call to drawImage(). If the hosting domain permits cross-domain access to the image, the image can be used in your canvas without tainting it; otherwise using the image will taint the canvas.
trans-unit.target: 使用 crossorigin 一个的属性 <img> 元件（由反射 HTMLImageElement.crossOrigin 属性），则可以请求允许来自另一个域加载图像用于在调用 drawImage() 。如果托管域允许跨域访问图像，则可以在画布中使用该图像而不会对其进行污染；否则，使用图像会弄脏画布。

trans-unit.source: Usually you'll use a value between 0.0 and 1.0 to indicate an offset into the first run of the animation at which to begin the animation performance, but any positive, non-infinite value is allowed. Since all animations' iteration indexes start at 0, a value of 0.5 would start the animation halfway through its first iteration or loop. Meanwhile, a value of 1.2 means the animation will begin playback 20% of the way through its second iteration, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 通常您会使用一个介于0.0和1.0之间的值来表示动画第一次运行的偏移量,在这个偏移量上开始执行动画,但允许使用任何正值、非无限值。由于所有动画的迭代索引都从0开始,所以0.5的值将使动画在其第一次迭代或循环的中途开始。同时,1.2的值意味着动画将在第二次迭代的20%处开始播放,以此类推。

trans-unit.source: Usually, your 3D geometry is already in a certain binary format, so you need to read the specification of that specific format to figure out the memory layout. However, if you are designing the format yourself, or your geometry is in text files (like Wavefront .obj files) and must be converted into an ArrayBuffer at runtime, you have free choice on how to structure the memory. For highest performance, interleave the attributes and use the smallest data type that still accurately represents your geometry.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您的3D几何图形已经是某种二进制格式，因此您需要阅读该特定格式的规范以找出内存布局。但是，如果您自己设计格式，或者几何体位于文本文件（如Wavefront .obj文件）中，并且必须在运行时转换为 ArrayBuffer ，则可以自由选择如何构造内存。为了获得最佳性能，请交织属性并使用仍能准确表示几何图形的最小数据类型。

trans-unit.source: We add our grammar to the list using the SpeechGrammarList.addFromString() method. This accepts as parameters the string we want to add, plus optionally a weight value that specifies the importance of this grammar in relation of other grammars available in the list (can be from 0 to 1 inclusive.) The added grammar is available in the list as a SpeechGrammar object instance.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 SpeechGrammarList.addFromString() 方法将 grammar 添加到列表中。这接受我们要添加的字符串作为参数，并可选地包含一个权重值，该权重值指定该语法相对于列表中可用的其他语法的重要性（可以为0到1）。添加的语法在列表中可用作为 SpeechGrammar 对象实例。

trans-unit.source: We also create data- attributes for each option, containing the name and language of the associated voice, so we can grab them easily later on, and then append the options as children of the select.
trans-unit.target: 我们还为每个选项创建 data- 属性，其中包含关联语音的名称和语言，因此以后我们可以轻松地抓住它们，然后将这些选项附加为select的子代。

trans-unit.source: We call Window.addEventListener() to start listening for the load event; once the page has finished loading, we get a reference to the element with the ID "box" using querySelector(), then call the createObserver() method we'll create in a moment to handle building and installing the intersection observer.

trans-unit.source: We call updateDeviceList() in two places. The first is in the getUserMedia() promise's fulfillment handler, to initially fill out the list when the stream is opened. The second is in the event handler for devicechange:

trans-unit.source: We call a function, scheduleStatusRefresh(), to handle scheduling a screen update to reflect changes to our progress.

trans-unit.source: We call the task's handler, task.handler, passing into it the task's data object (task.data).

trans-unit.source: We can also use the Web Animations API to figure out the animation's current time. The game ends when you run out of cake to eat or empty the bottle. Which vignette players are presented with depends on how far along Alice was in her animation, whether she grew too big and can't get in the tiny door anymore or too small and cannot reach the key to open the door. We can figure out whether she's on the large end or small end of her animation by getting her animation's currentTime and dividing it by her activeDuration:
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以使用Web Animations API来计算动画的当前时间。当您用完蛋糕吃掉或倒空瓶子时，游戏结束。向哪个小插图播放器显示取决于爱丽丝在动画中走了多远，她长得太大，不能再进入小门还是太小而无法触及打开门的钥匙。我们可以通过获取动画的 currentTime 并将其除以 activeDuration 来确定她是处于动画的大端还是小端：

trans-unit.source: We can also watch for changes to the signaling state (by accepting signalingstatechange events) and the ICE gathering state (by accepting icegatheringstatechange events). We aren't using these for anything, so all we do is log them. We could simply have not set up these event listeners at all.
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以监视信令状态（通过接受 signalingstatechange 事件）和ICE收集状态（通过接受 icegatheringstatechange 事件）的变化。我们没有将它们用于任何用途，因此我们要做的就是记录它们。我们可能根本就没有设置这些事件侦听器。

trans-unit.target: 我们可以将所有这些片段组合在一起，以使用 Animation() 构造函数创建一个有效的动画，也可以使用 Element.animate() 快捷方式函数。（在使用Web动画API中阅读有关如何使用 Element.animate() 的更多信息。）

This can be useful, as you may find you want to emulate distance, but volume can drop out and that's actually not what you want. By default, it's 10,000 (a unitless relative value). We can keep it as this:

trans-unit.target: 我们可以采用线性的方法,但在处理频率时,采用对数的方法要好得多,所以让我们用频率值来填充我们的数组,在数组项中越往上越大。

trans-unit.source: We could move the listener left or right using positionX, up or down using positionY, or in or out of the room using positionZ. Here we are setting the listener to be in the middle of the viewport and slightly in front of our boombox. We can also set the direction the listener is facing. The default values for these work well:
trans-unit.target: 我们可以左右移动收听或向右 positionX ，向上或向下使用 positionY 或或缩小使用房间的 positionZ 。在这里，我们将侦听器设置为在视口的中间，并位于我们的音箱的前面。我们还可以设置收听者面对的方向。这些的默认值很好用：

trans-unit.source: We could opt to monitor multiple elements for visibility intersection changes with respect to the viewport by calling observer.observe() for each of those elements, if we wanted to do so.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们愿意的话，我们可以通过为每个元素调用 observer.observe() 来监视多个元素是否相对于视口相交。

trans-unit.source: We could schedule our voices to play within a for loop, however the biggest problem with this is updating whilst it is playing, and we've already implemented UI controls to do so. Also, it would be really nice to consider an instrument-wide BPM control. The best way to get our voices to play on the beat is to create a scheduling system, whereby we look ahead at when the notes are going to play and push them into a queue. We can start them at a precise time with the currentTime property and also take into account any changes.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以安排声音在 for 循环中播放，但是最大的问题是在播放时进行更新，并且我们已经实现了UI控件。此外，考虑整个仪器范围内的BPM控件也将非常不错。使声音发动节奏的最佳方法是创建一个排程系统，在此系统中，我们将提前观察音符何时播放并将其排入队列。我们可以使用currentTime属性在精确的时间启动它们，也可以考虑任何更改。

trans-unit.source: We could, of course, hard-code the array of thresholds into our code, and often that's what you'll end up doing. But this example leaves room for adding configuration controls to adjust the granularity, for example.
trans-unit.target: 当然,我们可以将阈值数组硬编码到我们的代码中,通常这就是你最终要做的。但是这个例子给我们留下了添加配置控件来调整粒度的空间,比如说。

trans-unit.source: We currently have only one animation effect type available: KeyframeEffect. Potentially we could have all kinds of Animation Effects in the future—e.g. effects for grouping and sequencing, not unlike features we had in Flash. In fact, Group Effects and Sequence Effects have already been outlined in the currently-in-progress level 2 spec of the Web Animations API.
trans-unit.target: 当前，我们只有一种动画效果类型可用： KeyframeEffect 。将来，我们可能会拥有各种各样的动画效果，例如用于分组和排序的效果，与Flash中的功能不同。实际上，Web动画API的当前正在进行的2级规范中已经概述了组效果和序列效果。

trans-unit.source: We do the same thing with the number of tasks processed so far; if progressBarElem.value is different from the task number currently being processed (currentTaskNumber), then we update the displayed value of the currently-being-processed task and the current value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 到目前为止，我们对已处理的任务数量执行相同的操作；如果 progressBarElem.value 与当前正在处理的任务号（ currentTaskNumber ）不同，则我们将更新当前正在处理的任务的显示值和进度条的当前值。

trans-unit.source: We get the position of the mouse and crop an image of 5 pixels left and above to 5 pixels right and below. Then we copy that one over to another canvas and resize the image to the size we want it to. In the zoom canvas we resize a 10×10 pixel crop of the original canvas to 200×200.
trans-unit.target: 我们获得鼠标的位置，并将图像从左上方增加了5个像素，向右下方减少了5个像素。然后，将其复制到另一张画布上，然后将图像调整为我们想要的尺寸。在缩放画布中，我们将原始画布的10×10像素裁剪大小调整为200×200。

trans-unit.source: We have setTimeout() calls in place here — like we did with the initialization code at the top of the script — to make sure that the gamepads are ready to report their information when reportGamepads() is called in each case.
trans-unit.target: 我们在这里进行了 setTimeout() 调用（就像我们在脚本顶部使用初始化代码一样），以确保在每种情况下调用 reportGamepads() 时，游戏手柄都准备好报告其信息。

trans-unit.source: We have a simple introductory tutorial for those that are familiar with programming but need a good introduction to some of the terms and structure of the API.
trans-unit.target: 对于熟悉编程但需要对API的某些术语和结构有很好介绍的人员，我们提供了一个简单的入门教程。

trans-unit.source: We have also provided an event output page — if you load this page in another tab, then make changes to your choices in the landing page, you'll see the updated storage information outputted as a StorageEvent is fired.
trans-unit.target: 我们还提供了一个事件输出页面 -如果在另一个选项卡中加载该页面，然后在登录页面中更改选择，您将看到在触发 StorageEvent 时输出的更新存储信息。

trans-unit.source: We have created a couple of simple demos to show basic usage:
trans-unit.target: 我们已经创建了几个简单的演示来展示基本的使用方法。

trans-unit.source: We have created a directory of examples to go along with the Streams API documentation — see mdn/dom-examples/streams. The examples are as follows:
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了示例目录，以与Streams API文档一起使用-请参阅mdn / dom-examples / streams。示例如下：

trans-unit.source: We have created a simple example that allows you to play three different samples on a constant loop — see create-delay (you can also view the source code). If you just press the play buttons, the loops will start immediately; if you slide the sliders up to the right, then press the play buttons, a delay will be introduced, so the looping sounds don't start playing for a short amount of time.
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一个简单的示例，使您可以在一个恒定的循环中播放三个不同的样本—请参见create-delay（您也可以查看源代码）。如果您只按播放按钮，则循环将立即开始；否则，循环将立即开始。如果将滑块向右滑动，然后按播放按钮，则会引入延迟，因此循环声音不会在短时间内开始播放。

trans-unit.source: We have created a simple example that allows you to play three different samples on a constant loop — see create-delay (you can also view the source code). If you just press the play buttons, the loops will start immediately; if you slide the sliders up to the right, then press the play buttons, a delay will be introduced, so the looping sounds don't start playing for a short amount of time.

We have created an example called Unpack Chunks of a PNG (see it live also) that fetches an image as a stream, then pipes it through to a custom PNG transform stream that retrieves PNG chunks out of a binary data stream.
trans-unit.target: 我们创建了一个名为PNG的解压缩块的示例（另请参见实况），该示例以流的形式获取图像，然后将其通过管道传递到自定义PNG转换流，该流从二进制数据流中检索PNG块。

trans-unit.source: We need to associate a surface normal with each vertex. This is a vector that's perpendicular to the face at that vertex.

trans-unit.source: We need to create an empty container to put these numbers into, however, one that the Web Audio API understands. This is where AudioBuffer objects come in. You can fetch a file and decode it into a buffer (we'll get to that later on in the tutorial), or you can create an empty buffer and fill it with your own data.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要创建一个空容器将这些数字放入Web Audio API可以理解的容器中。这就是 AudioBuffer 对象的所在。您可以获取文件并将其解码为缓冲区（我们将在本教程的后面部分介绍），或者可以创建一个空缓冲区并用自己的数据填充它。

trans-unit.source: We need to create three arrays. One of frequency values for which we want to receive the magnitude response and phase response for, and two empty arrays to receive the data. All three of these have to be of type float32array and all be of the same size.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要创建三个数组。我们要为其接收幅度响应和相位响应的频率值之一，以及两个空数组以接收数据。所有这三个必须都是 float32array 类型，并且大小都相同。

trans-unit.source: We need to know the direction in which the light is traveling; this is defined by the direction vector.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要知道光的行进方向；这是由方向向量定义的。

trans-unit.source: We present our main interface in two columns. On the left is a start button and a <video> element which displays the video preview; this is the video the user's camera sees. Note that the autoplay attribute is used so that as soon as the stream starts to arrive from the camera, it immediately gets displayed, and the muted attribute is specified to ensure that the sound from the user's microphone isn't output to their speakers, causing an ugly feedback loop.
trans-unit.target: 我们在两列中介绍我们的主界面。左侧是开始按钮和显示视频预览的 <video> 元素。这是用户相机看到的视频。请注意，使用了 autoplay 属性，这样，当流开始从摄像机到达时，它将立即被显示，并且指定了 muted 属性，以确保不会将来自用户麦克风的声音输出到扬声器，从而导致丑陋的反馈回路。

The rest of the contents of this function is fairly standard XHR stuff, so we won’t worry about that for now.

This lets us provide a set of common values and special strings which the browser may optionally choose to display in some fashion; we provide names for the values 0.0 ("Mute") and 1.0 ("100%").
trans-unit.target: 我们将默认值指定为0.5，并提供一个 <datalist> 元素，该元素使用 name 属性连接到范围以查找ID匹配的选项列表。在这种情况下，数据集被命名为 "volume" 。这样我们就可以提供一组通用值和特殊字符串，浏览器可以选择以某种方式显示它们；我们提供了值0.0（“静音”）和1.0（“ 100％”）的名称。

trans-unit.source: We start by checking whether the primary mouse button is pressed, for two reasons. First, we want to only allow the primary mouse button to trigger notes playing. Second, and more importantly, we are using this to handle mouseover for cases where the user is dragging from note to note, and we only want to start playing the note if the mouse is pressed when it enters the element.

trans-unit.source: We start by establishing some global variables we'll need.

trans-unit.source: We then iterate over the tracks in the stream, calling addTrack() to add each track to the RTCPeerConnection. Even though the connection is not fully established yet, it's important to begin sending media to it as soon as possible, because the media will help the ICE layer decide on the best connectivity approach to take, aiding in the negotiation process.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们遍历流中的轨道，调用 addTrack() 将每个轨道添加到 RTCPeerConnection 。即使尚未完全建立连接，也应尽快开始向其发送媒体，这很重要，因为媒体将帮助ICE层确定采用的最佳连接方法，并有助于协商过程。

trans-unit.source: We then output the x, y and z position and orientation values for informational purposes, and use those values to update the xPos, yPos, zPos, xOrient, yOrient, and zOrient variables, which are used to update the scene rendering on each frame.

trans-unit.source: We then write out the data into the information box, updating it on every frame. We've clamped each value to three decimal places using toFixed(), as the values are hard to read otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们将数据写到信息框中，每帧更新一次。我们使用 toFixed() 将每个值限制在小数点后三位，因为否则很难读取这些值。

trans-unit.source: We took a different approach to loading the images this time. Instead of loading them by creating new HTMLImageElement objects, we included them as <img> tags directly in our HTML source and retrieved the images from those. The images are hidden from output by setting the CSS property display to none for those images.
trans-unit.target: 这次我们采用了另一种方法来加载图像。我们没有通过创建新的 HTMLImageElement 对象来加载它们，而是将它们作为 <img> 标签直接包含在我们的HTML源代码中，并从其中检索图像。通过将这些图像的CSS属性 display 设置为none，可以从输出中隐藏图像。

trans-unit.source: We track the "last access time" for each origin using temporary storage. Once the global limit for temporary storage is reached (more on the limit later), we try to find all currently unused origins (i.e., ones with no tabs/apps open that are keeping open datastores). These are then sorted according to "last access time." The least recently used origins are then deleted until there's enough space to fulfill the request that triggered this origin eviction.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用临时存储跟踪每个原点的 "最后访问时间"。一旦达到了临时存储的全局限制(关于限制的更多内容稍后再说),我们就会尝试找到所有当前未使用的原点(即那些没有打开标签/应用程序的原点,这些原点保持着开放的数据存储)。然后根据 "最后访问时间 "对这些进行排序。然后,最近使用最少的起源会被删除,直到有足够的空间来满足触发这个起源驱逐的请求。

trans-unit.target: 我们会在本文中看到更详细的内容。

trans-unit.source: We'll set up our first OscillatorNode the same way as our sweep sound, except we won't use a wavetable to set a bespoke wave — we'll just use the default sine wave:
trans-unit.target: 我们将以与扫频相同的方式设置我们的第一个 OscillatorNode ，不同之处在于我们将不使用波表来设置定制波-我们将使用默认 sine ：

trans-unit.source: We'll take another look at fillStyle, in more detail, later in this tutorial. Here, all we're doing is using it to change the fill color for paths from the default color of black to white, and then back again.
trans-unit.target: 在本教程的后面，我们将更详细地查看 fillStyle 。在这里，我们正在做的就是使用它来将路径的填充颜色从默认的黑色更改为白色，然后再次更改。

trans-unit.source: We'll then add a line to update the playbackRate property to our playSample() function. The final version looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 然后，我们将添加一行更新 playbackRate 属性我们 playSample() 函数。最终版本如下所示：

trans-unit.source: We're also rotating the shape, and we can do that here, by applying a transform. We'll do that first. The rotated position of the vertex is computed by applying the rotation vector, found in the uniform uRotationVector, that's been computed by the JavaScript code.
trans-unit.target: 我们也在旋转形状，我们可以在此处通过应用变换来做到这一点。我们首先要做。顶点的旋转位置是通过应用在统一 uRotationVector 中找到的旋转向量来计算的，该向量是由JavaScript代码计算出来的。

trans-unit.source: We're going to be looking at a very simple step sequencer:
trans-unit.target: 我们要看的是一个非常简单的步骤排序器。

trans-unit.source: We're now maintaining separate counts based only on the value of label. Because the label "alice" in line 11 matched the value of user twice, it is not considered an independent event.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们仅根据 label 的值维护单独的计数。因为第11行中的标签“ alice” 两次匹配 user 的值，所以它不被视为独立事件。

trans-unit.source: We've already created an input node by passing our audio element into the API. For the most part, you don't need to create an output node, you can just connect your other nodes to BaseAudioContext.destination, which handles the situation for you:
trans-unit.target: 我们已经通过将音频元素传递到API中来创建输入节点。在大多数情况下，您无需创建输出节点，只需将其他节点连接到 BaseAudioContext.destination 即可为您处理情况：

trans-unit.source: We've also asked for an index named "name" that looks at the name property of the stored objects. As with createObjectStore(), createIndex() takes an optional options object that refines the type of index that you want to create. Adding objects that don't have a name property still succeeds, but the objects won't appear in the "name" index.
trans-unit.target: 我们还要求提供一个名为“名称”的索引，该索引可以查看存储对象的 name 属性。与 createObjectStore() 一样， createIndex() 采用一个可选的 options 对象，该对象将细化您要创建的索引的类型。添加不具有 name 属性的对象仍然可以成功，但是这些对象不会出现在“ name”索引中。

trans-unit.source: We've also included an onchange handler on each form element so that the data and styling are updated whenever a form value is changed:
trans-unit.target: 我们还在每个表单元素上包括一个 onchange 处理程序，以便每当更改表单值时都会更新数据和样式：

trans-unit.source: We've now got an instrument inside our browser! Keep playing and experimenting — you can expand on any of these techniques to create something much more elaborate.
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们的浏览器中有了一个仪器！继续努力并进行实验-您可以扩展这些技术中的任何一种，以创建更加精致的内容。

trans-unit.source: We've written a simple pointer lock demo to show you how to use it to set up a simple control system (see source code). The demo looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们编写了一个简单的指针锁定演示，以向您展示如何使用它来建立一个简单的控制系统（请参阅源代码）。该演示如下所示：

trans-unit.source: We've written a real world demo to give more of an idea of how web notifications can be used:
trans-unit.target: 我们写了一个真实的演示,让大家更多地了解如何使用网络通知。

trans-unit.source: We've written up a simple example to demonstrate — see our vr-controller-basic-info source code (see it running live here also). This demo simply outputs information on the VR displays and gamepads connected to your computer.
trans-unit.target: 我们编写了一个简单的示例进行演示—请参阅vr-controller-basic-info源代码（也可以在此处实时运行）。该演示仅在连接到计算机的VR显示器和游戏手柄上输出信息。
